full_summary:
**Refrigerated General Purpose Benchtop Centrifuge Requirements (Procurement Reference Number: cb-8948-86123557)**

## Job Summary

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) is seeking the provision of a new refrigerated general purpose, benchtop centrifuge by a pre-qualified supplier pursuant to a Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI.

## Bidding Information
- **RFP Reference Number:** cb-8948-86123557
- **RFP Title (English/French):** Refrigerated General Purpose Benchtop Centrifuge (Centrifugeuse réfrigérée à usage général)
- **Publication Date:** 2023-09-14
- **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-09-29T14:00:00
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-10-06
- **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-03-29

## Pre-qualification Requirements
Suppliers wishing to participate must hold a pre-qualification established under the Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI for the Purchase of Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts, and Accessories, Services and Supplies.

## Tenders Evaluation
Tenders will be evaluated in accordance with the selection criteria outlined in the attached RFP document on a competitive basis.

## Procurement Details
- **Procurement Category:** Goods
- **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (Notification de demande de propositions)
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Selective Tendering
- **Location:** Prince Edward Island
- **Contracting Entity:** Canadian Food Inspection Agency (Agency Canadienne d'Inspection des Aliments (ACIA))
- **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada

## Attachments and Contact Information
To access the tender notice and RFP documentation, please visit [insert attachment hyperlink, e.g. https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8948/2024-00105-npp.pdf].
For more information, please contact:
Alexander Lisowski
E-mail: [alexander.lisowski@inspection.gc.ca](mailto:alexander.lisowski@inspection.gc.ca)
Phone: (613) 285-6119
Address: 1400 Merivale Road, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0Y9, Canada.  End of Entry.
